item.title: How to Create a Hugo Blog Using GitHub
item.description: I am a professional developer, but I believe you do not need to be one to build a blog with some code. There are many tools out there that (usually with a fee) allow us to create websites without programming, and it is okay to use them. However, if you, like me, just want a simple blog that you’d like to have control over, likes to code you can go with this approach.
